Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone setup between two students indicating communication over a distance.
The student can illustrate the use of sound in the string telephone design to show how it helps in communicating.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing that the string telephone solves the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can include the materials used in the drawing (e.g., cups and string) to show how they work together to send sound.
